title: Lakshmi Kamal Kundanalu: Diamond-Accented Lotus Stud Earrings
materials: Natural Ruby accent. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: Delicately crafted lotus motif representing Goddess Lakshmi, the embodiment of prosperity and auspiciousness. The lotus is adorned with dazzling diamonds, while a striking emerald cabochon forms the center. A small ruby provides a touch of traditional color contrast. The openwork design adds a touch of modernity to this classic design.
colors: and Sparkling White (Diamonds). The traditional combination of red and green is considered highly auspicious.
occasions: or as a statement piece for formal events. Suitable for half-saree functions and other traditional celebrations.
description: These Lakshmi Kamal Kundanalu are more than just earrings; they are a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The exceptional craftsmanship, combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the vibrancy of emeralds, makes them a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, and the push-back closure guarantees a secure and comfortable fit. A timeless heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
